title: Quarkus CLI fails updating 2.x projects to 3.x
body:
### Describe the bug

`quarkus update --stream=3.1` fails on German Windows 10 with cmd or git-bash

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

`rewrite-maven-plugin` has issues with the `plainTextMasks`:
```
[INFO] --- quarkus-maven-plugin:3.1.1.Final:update (default-cli) @ update-test ---
[WARNING] quarkus:update goal is experimental, its options and output might change in future versions
[INFO] Looking for the newly published extensions in registry.quarkus.io
[INFO] Instructions to update this project from '2.16.6.Final' to '3.1.0.CR1':
[INFO]
[INFO] Recommended Quarkus platform BOM updates:
[INFO] Update: io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:pom:2.16.6.Final -> 3.1.0.CR1
[INFO]
[INFO] Resolved io.quarkus:quarkus-updates-recipes:1.0.2 with 1 recipe(s) to update from 2.16.6.Final to 3.1.0.CR1 (initially made for OpenRewrite MAVEN plugin version: 4.43.0)
[WARNING] The update feature does not yet handle updates of the extension versions. If needed, update your extensions manually.
[INFO]
[INFO]
[INFO]
[INFO]  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Executing:
C:\Users\user\bin\apache-maven-3.8.8\bin\mvn.cmd -e org.openrewrite.maven:rewrite-maven-plugin:4.43.0:run -D"plainTextMasks=**/*.md,**/*.kt,**/src/test/resources/__snapshots__/**/*.java,**/*.adoc,**/META-INF/services/**,**/*.txt,**/src/main/codestarts/**/*.java" -D"rewrite.configLocation=C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Temp\quarkus-project-recipe-17943718553051293441.yaml" -D"activeRecipes=io.quarkus.openrewrite.Quarkus" -D"rewrite.pomCacheEnabled=false"
[INFO]
[ERROR] "=**/*.md" kann syntaktisch an dieser Stelle nicht verarbeitet werden.
[INFO]
[INFO]
[INFO]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  4.290 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2023-06-09T16:58:44+02:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
```

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Microsoft Windows [Version 10.0.19045.2965] (German language)

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.6" 2023-01-17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

CLI version 3.1.1.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven 3.8.8

### Additional information

_No response_
